articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: Mansour Abdoli, PhD
articles.contents:
This portfolio showcases my work on development of practical tools that I use in teaching statistics and applying it to research. My focus in on Transparency, Reproducibility, and of course, Automation and Reusability
Acknowledgement
The work is partially supported by a Jr.Sr. Grant awarded through the Office of Research and Sponsored Projects (ORSP) at CSUF.
